title: www.najawa.com
content:
Yup, I got it up and running - Right now, it is more of a glorification of my freewebs account, but it is getting better.

Here's what I have:

www.najawa.com - Homepage

www.ck.najawa.com - My Keen Project list (Not much yet, but is is slowly getting better)

www.ck.najawa.com/mods - My mods, and a short description of how I started modding

www.comp.najawa.com - My musical compositions I have composed

www.games.najawa.com - The games I have created (Harvey, would you like to beta test them for me?)

www.forums.najawa.com - A list of my forums; so far, I only set up a main site forum, were you can post (as guest) about issues, and what you like about my site. And a forum for me and my schoolmates... though, none of you go to my school, so... (BTW - The food forum is not up... yet; but will be a really fun forum where you can share you most delicious recipies!!! And just plain talk about food)

www.mercyacademy.najawa.com - A password protected domain for me and my schoolmates. Srry.

And then a few more pages for my friends, but their sites are just "Under Construction" Pages.

Well, what do you think?Proud Leader of the "Tough Guys Wear Pink" Society
[img]http://www.najawa.com/LLMod.jpeg[/img]
"Tough Guys Wear Pink!!!"
Visit My site at [url=http://www.najawa.com]www.najawa.com[/url]
[url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?Najawa]Click Here!!! Please!!![/url]
-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: www.najawa.com
content:
Woa!!! I am not even close to being done; I am trying to make a Keen Fan-page, and so I need ideas. Ideas forthe whole site as well. Post in my forums if you want, as well (I notice that Harvey has joined already).

BTW - Should I host a phpBB version of PCKF? I can set it up really quickly... with all of your help. I would just, first, copy everything onto my computer, and organiza it. Then I'd make a list of every poster, and then create user for them. All you need to do is activate them. I'd make all the passwords the same, so I could just post for everyone, and then, walla; it's up.

Or not.

I need ideas... and you are going to give them to me.

I hope to have it up, compleatly, in time for Christmas [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-christmas.gif[/img] Proud Leader of the "Tough Guys Wear Pink" Society

title: Re: www.najawa.com
content:
NO.
You won't start a new PCKF. It's CC314's board, and they will host and maintain it in the future as well.
If you're making some Keen board then at least name if differently. I wouldn't join it. And, don't create my profile there.

Besides, perhaps you could remove your signature picture
[url=http://www.najawa.com/LLMod.jpeg]www.najawa.com/LLMod.jpeg[/url]
for a while, or at least remove the password protection from that folder, since every time you use that in your post as image it asks the password to your site (at least in the newest Opera).Eat your veggies!
